verbose_text: We found that the expression of the anti-inflammatory cytokine, Tgf-beta, which is known to play a beneficial role in DSS induced colitis, was slightly upregulated when the mice were challenged with DSS; however, we did not observe a significant difference between the LysMCre +/- / Il-6r fl/fl mice and their littermate controls.
evidence: expression of the anti-inflammatory cytokine, Tgf-beta
